name: FMAP
body:
### Welcome to the FMAP repository.
FMAP is a technique and the name of our tool to perform application feature matching of web applications across desktop and mobile platforms. Currently our paper is under submission and we have created this website for reviewers. We will release more details about the paper soon!


### Artifacts
FMAP is organized on github as follows.
* [**http-trace**](https://github.com/gatech/fmap/tree/master/http-trace): The trace extraction tool implemented as a extension to the Google Chrome platform
* [**traces**](https://github.com/gatech/fmap/tree/master/traces): traces collected by http-trace
* [**fmap**](https://github.com/gatech/fmap/tree/master/fmap): Code for performing the feature matching


### Authors and Contributors
* [Shauvik Roy Choudhary](http://www.cc.gatech.edu/~shauvik) @shauvik
* [Dr. Mukul Prasad](http://www.flacp.fujitsulabs.com/~mprasad)
* [Dr. Alessandro Orso](http://www.cc.gatech.edu/~orso) @alexorso


### Publications
* Shauvik Roy Choudhary, Mukul Prasad, Alessandro Orso, "Cross-Platform Feature Matching for Web Applications", Proceedings of ACM SIGSOFT International Symposium on Software Testing and Analysis (ISSTA 2014). _To appear_


### Support or Contact
Having trouble with anything on this site? Contact shauvik {at} gatech [dot] edu and weâ€™ll help you sort it out.
